content.rendered:
Directed by Basil Joseph.

Written by Rakesh Mantodi.

Cast Tovino Thomas(Anjaneya Das). Renji Panicker(Captain). Wamiqa Gabbi(Aditi Singh). Aju Varghese(Balan). Hareesh Peradi(Ravi). Maala Parvathi(Das’ Mother (as Parvathi T.)). Sreejith Ravi(Vijayan). Aarushi Vedikha(Pinto) . Binu Adimali(Rogue Man). Bijukuttan(Kola Machan). Dharmajan Bolgatty(Danger). Shine Tom Chacko(Kidilan Firoze (Cameo)). Minnal George(Self – Referee). Gokulan(Driver). Shohaibkhan Hanifrawther(Nationalgames official). Basil Joseph(Villager). Hareesh Kanaran(Dhim Dhimi (as Hareesh Perumanna)). Kalesh Kannattu(Manikuttan). Pradeep Kottayam(Janappan). Lukman Lukku(Jabir (as Lukman)). Mammukoya(Pokker). Harisree Martin(Wrestler’s Husband). Suresh Nair(Chandran). Niranjan(Running Boy). Dinesh Prabhakar(Comrade (as Dinesh Nair)). Bala Saravanan(Muthu Pandian). Jithan V. Soubhagom(Villager)

Language Malayalam.

Producers A.V. Anoop. Prasobh Krishna. Mukesh R. Mehta. C.V. Sarathi. Sunpreet Singh.

Production E4 Entertainment.
